title: List of all Android rate app  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android rate app  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Android-RateThisApp
repoList.description: Android library to show "Rate this app" dialog

repoList.name: AppRater
repoList.description: AppRater Library for Android

repoList.name: Android-Rate
repoList.description: Android-Rate is a library to help you promote your android app by prompting users to rate the app after using it for a few days.

repoList.name: smart-app-rate
repoList.description: An Android library that encourages users to rate the app on the Google Play.

repoList.name: AndroidRate
repoList.description: AndroidRate is a library to help you promote your Android app by prompting users to rate the app after using it for a few days.

repoList.name: Android-Five-Stars-Library
repoList.description: Android Five Stars Library is a small library that helps developer add a "Rate My App" dialog to their applications. It's called "Five Stars" because the dialog has a different behaviour based on the rating given by the user.

repoList.name: AppRater
repoList.description: Android library that lets you prompt users to rate your application on their appstore (e.g. Google Play)

repoList.name: AppRate
repoList.description: Personal fork of AppRate to update to MaterialDialogs API

repoList.name: rate-me
repoList.description: Android library that shows a dialog to let the user rate this app in the Google Play store

repoList.name: easy-rating-dialog
repoList.description: A plug and play ;) android library for displaying a "rate this app" dialog
